name: RemoteObjectController

methods.name: create
methods.signature: public static Map<String,Object> create(String type, Map<String,Object> fields)
methods.description: Create a record in the database.

params.name: fields
params.description: The sObject type on which create is being called. The fields and values to set on the new record.

methods.name: del
methods.signature: public static Map<String,Object> del(String type, List<String> recordIds)

params.name: recordIds
params.description: The sObject type on which delete is being called. The IDs of the records to be deleted.

methods.name: retrieve
methods.signature: public static Map<String,Object> retrieve(String type, List<String> fields, Map<String,Object> criteria)

params.name: criteria
params.description: The sObject type on which retrieve is being called. The fields to retrieve for each record. The criteria to use when performing the query.

methods.name: updat
methods.signature: public static Map<String,Object> updat(String type, List<String> recordIds, Map<String,Object> fields)

params.name: fields
params.description: The sObject type on which update is being called. The IDs of the records to be updated. The fields to update, and the value to update each field with.

description: Use RemoteObjectController to access the standard Visualforce Remote Objects operations in your Remote Objects override methods.
